Silver School of Social Work Doctor of Philosophy
Silver School of Social Work Doctor of Philosophy

Overview of the Doctor of Philosophy at the Silver School, covering curriculum, faculty, research, teaching experience, their lecture series, and student success stories. The website also covers the program requirements, including course descriptions of the social work core classes, advanced methodological/statistical courses, and substantive area of expertise courses, as well information on career preparation, the research practicum, qualifying exam, and dissertation.
